item.title: events
item.description: future conferences 65th ISI World Statistics Congress 2025 (October 05-09, 2025 - The Hague, The Netherlands) International Scientific Joint Meeting of the Italian and Dutch-Flemish Classification Societies (September 08-10, 2025 - Naples, Italy) Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation 2025 (July 07-09, 2025 - Kruger National Park, South Africa) recent events 2024 VOC Jubilee conference (November 21-22, 2024 - Leusden, The Netherlands) 18th Conference of the International Federation and Classification Societies (July 15-17, 2024 - San Jose, Costarica) 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 17-20, 2024 - Bari, Italy) 12th VOC conference (March 08, 2024 - Nijmegen, The Netherlands)

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects software seminars and talks events supervisions and teaching
